---
name: "✨ Enhancement"
about: Improve an existing feature or make something work better
title: "[Enhancement] "
labels: ["enhancement"]
---

## What should be enhanced?
Briefly describe the improvement to an existing feature or workflow.

## Why enhance this?
Explain the benefit — better UX, clarity, performance, reliability, etc.

## Suggested approach (optional)
Any ideas or examples for how the enhancement could be done.

## Anything else?
Links, notes, or related issues.
